FuncDef: The reset isis statistics received-purge-lsp command clears statistics about received purge LSPs with 00-00 fragments. The reset isis statistics received-purge-lsp command clears statistics about received purge LSPs with 00-00 fragments.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of the IS-IS process from which statistics about purge LSPs with 00-00 fragments are to be cleared.
By default, statistics about purge LSPs with 00-00 fragments received by all processes are cleared.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.
